TEXT.TITLE: BEAR AUTOMOTIVE <BEAR.O> TO TRADE ON NASDAQ
TEXT.BODY: Bear Automotive Service Equipment Co said its common stock will begin trading June 16 on the NASDAQ National Market System. The company manufactures computerized electronic diagnostic and wheel alignment equipment. Reuter
